infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Eidcarosse uses the camera to capture and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Eidcarosse needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Eidcarosse needs access to the photo library to select and upload user profile image and Listing Image to the server.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Eidcarosse usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Eidcarosse usages device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Eidcarosse uses device location on listing information, Listing search Data and User information.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Eidcarosse uses your microphone while taking video of your product for uploading in listing information.
